title: Enhancing Social Studies Teaching Competencies Through Video Material Development and Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and Fundamental Knowledge of Social Studies Curriculum
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers to independently develop and utilize video materials in smartphone-accessible environments.

learning_goals: Over 90% of learners can produce 3-minute "overview" video materials on social studies topics using tablet tools
Learners can integrate developed video materials with concept maps and instructional design maps for teaching plans
Learners can analyze the educational effectiveness of produced video materials through peer assessment and suggest improvement directions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
